questions.question: Abayobozi bashobora kunyura mu nzira z’ impade z’ abanyamaguru mu gihe:

answers.answer: b)	Ubugari bw’ umuhanda budahagije kugira ngo ibisikana ryorohe
a)	Bashaka kwihuta
c)	Ntabanyamagru bagenda muri iyo nzira.
d)	B na c nibyo bisubizo by’ ukuri.

questions.question: Iyo ikinyabiziga gihagaze ku nzira nyabagendwa umuyobozi wacyo adahari, umukozi ubifitiye ububasha ashobora kugikuzaho ariko ibyacyangirikaho n’amafaranga yo kugikuzaho ntibibarwa kuri leta mu gihe:

answers.answer: b)	Cyahashyizwe binyuranije n’amategeko yo guhagarara akanya gato cyangwa kanini
a)	Cyahashyizwe n’ umuyobozi udafite uruhushya rwo kugitwara
c)	A na b n’ ibisubizo by’ ukuri
d)	Nta gisubizo cy’ ukuri kirimo

questions.question: ibyapa byo ku mihanda bigizwe gusa:

answers.answer: c)	Ibyapa biburira, ibyapa byo gutambuka mbere, ibimenyetso bibuza cyangwa bitegeka , n’ ibyapa ndanga.
a)	Ibyapa biburira
b)	Ibyapa byo gutambuka mbere
d)	Ibimenyetso bibuza cyangwa bitegeka

questions.question: umurobngo ugizwe na mpandeshatu nyampanga zifite amasonga yerekeye aho abayobozi zireba baturuka, kandi uciye ku buryo bugororotse ku nkengero y’ umuhanda werekana:

answers.answer: b)	Aho abayozozi bagomba guhagarara akanya gato iyo bishoboka
a)	Ahanyurwa n’ abanyamaguru
c)	Ahanyurwa n’ amagare
d)	Nta gisubizo cy’ ukuri kirimo

questions.question: Iki cyapa gisobanura ko :

answers.answer: b)	Hatanyurwa
a)	Hanyurwa mu cyerekezo kimwe
c)	Umuhanda udakomeza
d)	Nta gisubizo cy’ ukuri kirimo

questions.question: umuyobozi uvuye mu nzira nyabagendwa ifite ibyererekezo bibiri akaba ashaka kwinjira muyindi ifite icyerekezo kimwe agomaba:

answers.answer: b)	Kureka ibinyabiziga bigendamo bigatambuka
a)	Gucana amatara magufi
c)	A na b n’ ibisubizo by’ ukuri
d)	Nta gisubizo cy’ ukuri kirimo

questions.question: Iyo umuhanda ugabinyejwemo ibisate bitatu kand I ukaba ugendwamo mu byerekezo byombi, umuyobozi wese abujijwe:

answers.answer: b)	Kugendera mu gisate cyerekeye inkombe y’ ibumoso
a)	Kugendera mu gisate cyerekeye inkombe y’ iburyo.
c)	Kongera umuvuduko
d)	A na c nibyo bisubizo by’ ukuri.

questions.question: kunyuranaho mu ruhande rw’ ibumoso birabujijwe mu bihe bikurikira:

answers.answer: b)	Iyo umuyobozi unyurwaho yerekanye ko ashaka gukatira ibumoso
a)	Iyo ikinyabiziga kinyurwaho ari kirekire
c)	A na b nibyo bisubizo by’ ukuri
d)	Nta gisubizo cy’ ukuri kirimo

questions.question: Umuyobozi ubonye ko hari undi umukurikiye ashaka kumunyuraho agomba kubahiriza ibi bikurikira:

answers.answer: a)	Kwegera iruhande rw’ iburyo bw’ umuhanda
b)	Kongera umuvuduko
c)	Guhagarara
c)	Guhagarara

questions.question: umuyobozi wese agomba gushobora guharika ikinyabiziga cye akurikije ibi bikurikira:

answers.answer: c)	Imbere y’ inkomyi yose idatunguranye
a)	Uko ikinyabiziga giteye
b)	Aho ageza amaso
d)	B na c nibyo bisubizo by’ ukuri

questions.question: Iyo nta mategeko awugabanya by’umwihariko, umuvuduko ntarengwa w’ibinyabiziga by’ubuhinzi ni:

answers.answer: b.	Ibirometero 25 ku isaha
a.	Ibirometero 50 ku isaha
c.	Ibirometero 60 ku isaha
d.	Ibirometero 40 ku isaha

questions.question: Abagendera mu nzira nyabagendwa babujijwe kwata:

answers.answer: c)	A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
a)	Umurongo w’abasirikare bagenda cyangwa imirongo y’ibinyabiziga by’ingabo z’igihugu zigenda mu muhanda
b)	Mu murongo w’abanyeshuri bashorewe n’umwarimu n’uruhererekane
d)	Nta gisubizo cy’ukuri kirimo

questions.question: Kunyura ku binyabiziga bindi uretse icy’ibiziga bibiri bibujijwe:

answers.answer: b)	Hafi y’aho abanyamaguru banyura.
a)	Ako kanya mbere y’uko no mu gihe bava mu masangano Atari ayo bagendamo bazengurutse iyo kugenda mu muhanda biyoborwa n’ibimenyetso by’umuriro
c)	A na b nibyo bizubizo by’ ukuri.
d)	Nta gsibizo cy’ ukuri kirimo

questions.question: Inkombe z’inzira nyabagendwa cyangwa z’umuhanda zishobora kugaragazwa:

answers.answer: c.	N’ibikoresho ngarurarumuri
a.	N’imirongo idacagaguye
b.	N’ibyapa byo ku mihanda
d.	Nta gisubizo cy’ukuri kirimo

questions.question: Ibyapa biburira nibyo gutambuka mbere birangwa:

answers.answer: d.	Nta gisubizo cy’ukuri kirimo
a.	Ishusho mpandeshatu, ubuso ubururu, ikirango umukara
b.	Ishusho mpandeshatu, ubuso umweru, ikirango umukara
c.	Ishusho mpandeshatu, ubuso ubururu, ikirango umweru

questions.question: Iyo kuva bwije kugeza bukeye, bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200, mu nzira nyabagendwa ibinyabiziga bihinga bigomba kugaragazwa mu buryo bukurikira:

answers.answer: a.	Inyuma ni amatara abiri atukura
b.	Imbere ni itara rimwe ryera
c.	Inyuma ni itara rimwe ritukura
d.	Nta gisubizo cy’ukuri kirimo

questions.question: Umuyobozi wese agomba gushobora guhagarika ikinyabiziga cye akurikije ibi bikurikira:

answers.answer: d.	B na C ni byo bisubizo by’ukuri
a.	Uko ikinyabiziga giteye
b.	Aho ageza amaso
c.	Imbere y’inkomyi yose idatunguranye

questions.question: Igice cy’umuhanda kiri hakurya y’umurongo mugari wera udacagaguye kigenewe:

answers.answer: c.	Guhagararwamo umwanya munini n’umuto keretse ku byerekeye imihanda irombereje y’ibisate byinshi n’imihanda y’imodoka
a.	Guhagararwamo umwanya muto
b.	Guhagararwamo umwanya munini cyeretse kubyerekeye imihanda irombereje y’ibisate byinshi n’imihanda y’imodoka
d.	Nta gisubizo cy’ukuri kirimo

questions.question: Intangiriro n’iherezo ry’ahantu hahagararwa umwanya munini bishobora kugaragazwa na:

answers.answer: c.	Umurongo wera udacagaguye wambukiranya umuhanda
a.     Umurongo w’umuhondo udacagaguye wambukiranya umuhanda
b.	Umurongo wera ucagaguye wambukiranya umuhanda
d.	Nta gisubizo cy’ukuri kirimo

questions.question: Itara ry’icyatsi kibisi risa n’akarangacyerekezo gafite isonga ryerekeye hasi risobanura ko:

answers.answer: b.	Byemewe kugenda kugisate cy’ umuhanda rigenga ku bayobozi bakigana
a.	Bitemewe kugenda kugisate cy’umuhanda rigenga
c.	Ibisubizo byose sibyo
